content: this design consists of six different variations on a single pattern that can be used to create a variety of items for decor and gift-giving such as garland advent calendars and ornaments or as packaging for small gifts change colors as your heart desires to create a wide variety of unique stockings simple gifts made for sharing materials + crochet hook size g/6 4 0 mm + stitch marker s + scissors + tapestry needle + yarnspirations caron simply soft worsted 4-medium 100% acrylic 315 yds/288 m 6 oz/170 g color a dark sage color b white amount of each color used varies per stocking based on design choice stocking in solid color uses approx 39 yds/36 m + the red seen in some of the pictures but not noted in the patterns is yarnspirations caron simply soft worsted 4-medium 100% acrylic 315 yds/288 m 6 oz/170 g in harvest red finished measurements at its widest stockings measure 3 inches 7 cm wide by 4 5 inches 11 5 cm tall not including the hanging tab for further and perhaps easier reference this is enough space for two regular tubes of lipstick with enough space in the toe of the stocking to place something else perhaps a small chocolate if desired abbreviations/stitches used chain - chain round s - round s row s - row single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch s standing crochet magic_ring/magic_ring
